bug.author: caisq
bug.summary: squeeze() doesn't work with axis argument `[-1]`
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
core 0.13.12 (latest) Say x is a 2D tensor. If you do x.squeeze([-1]), the return value is still a 2D tensor! It should be 1D.

comments.comment: I would love to give this issue a try if <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nsthorat>@nsthorat</denchmark-link> hasn't started working on this already.
@VisibleMarkov Sounds great! I don't think he's working on that AFAIK.
I'm not working on it, go for it!
Thanks for the green flag, will have a PR ready by the end of the day ðŸ˜„
